Items.Title: Roll Call
Invocation
Items.AgendaNote:
INVOCATION - Delivered by: Rabbi Iris Richman, Founder, Jewish Voices Together located at 244 Union Avenue, Brooklyn, NY 11211.

Motion to spread the Invocation in full upon the record by Council Member Gutiérrez.
Items.MinutesNote:
The Invocation was delivered by Rabbi Iris Richman, Founder, Jewish Voices Together located at 244 Union Avenue, Brooklyn, N.Y. 11211.

Council Member Gutiérrez moved to spread the Invocation in full upon the Record.

Items.MinutesNote: The Majority Leader (Council Member Powers) presiding as the President Pro Tempore.

The presence of a quorum was announced by the Majority Leader and Acting President Pro Tempore (Council Member Powers).

There were 49 Council Members marked present at this Stated Meeting.
At this point the Speaker (Council Member Adams) made the following announcements:

Whereupon on motion of the Speaker (Council Member Adams), the Majority Leader and Acting President Pro Tempore (Council Member Powers) adjourned these proceedings to meet again for the Charter Meeting of January 4, 2023.

MICHAEL McSWEENEY, City Clerk
Clerk of the Council

Items.Title: Passed The Consent Agenda
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that these files be approved by consent vote.

Items.MinutesNote: The Majority Leader and Acting President Pro Tempore (Council Member Powers) put the question whether the Council would agree with and adopt such reports, which were decided in the affirmative by the following vote:
